DOC.criteria: Premenopausal ; Body mass index 3040 kg/m2 ; Waist circumference > 88 cm Evidence metabolic cardiovascular disease ; Pregnancy ; Hyperlipidemia ( fast plasma triglyceride concentration > 150 mg/dl ) ; Hematocrit < 34 % ; Undertaking regular exercise ( i.e. , > 2 times/week )
